|rad2oui = |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 4 |rad2rxchains = 4 |rad2sstreams = 4 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 1733 |rad2n = 600 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *[[D-Link COVR-3902]] (US) - ''AC3900 Whole Home Wi-Fi System'' :D-Link COVR-2600R - ''Covr AC2600 Seamless Wi-Fi Router'' :[[D-Link COVR-1300E]] - ''Covr AC1300 Seamless Wi-Fi Range Extender'' ==Links of Interest== ===News=== *[http://us.dlink.com/press-centre/press-releases/covr/ ''D-Link Covr Wi-Fi System PR'' on '''D-Link (US)'''] ===Reviews=== *[http://www.techhive.com/article/3153887/network-router/d-links-covr-home-networking-line-router-with-wireless-powerline-extenders.html ''D-Link’s Covr home networking line pairs a high-end router
with wireless and powerline range extenders'' on '''TechHive'''] :[[D-Link DKT-883]] (COVR-3902 - Covr Wi-Fi Kit) consists of a :*[[D-Link DIR-883 rev A1]] - ''AC2600 MU-MIMO Dual-band Router'' :*[[D-Link DAP-1655 rev A1]] - ''AC1300 Gigabit Wi-FI Extender'' ==See also== :;[[List of Wireless Systems]] *[[D-Link R15 AX1500 (Eagle Pro AI)]] • Smart Router • [http://www.dlink.com/en/products/r15-eagle-pro-ai-ax1500-smart-router PPage] *[[D-Link R32 AX3200 (Eagle Pro AI)]] • Smart Router • [https://www.dlink.com/en/products/r32-eagle-pro-ai-ax3200-smart-router PPage] *[[D-Link M30 AX3000 (Aquila Pro AI)]] • Smart Mesh Router *[[D-Link M60 AX6000 (Aquila Pro AI)]] • Smart Mesh Router :;FCC ID - KA2 *KA2E30A1 (2023-10-31) • AX3000 Wi-Fi 6 Range Extender *KA2M60A1 (2023-10-04) • AX6000 Dual-Band Wi-Fi 6 Router (Single pack), :AX6000 Dual-Band Wi-Fi 6 Mesh System (Multi-pack) *KA2M30A1 (2023-07-17) • AX3000 Dual-Band Wi-Fi 6 Router (Single pack), :AX3000 Dual-Band Wi-Fi 6 Mesh System (multi-pack) *KA2M18A1 (2022-08-31) • AX1800 Wi-Fi 6 AI Router/AX1800 Mesh Router/AX1800 Mesh System *KA2R18A1 (2022-08-15) • AX1800 Wi-Fi 6 AI Router/AX1800 Smart Router *KA2E15A1 (2022-07-21) • AX1500 Wi-Fi 6 AI Range Extender/AX1500 Mesh Range Extender * *KA2M32A1 (2022-07-19) • AX3200 Wi-Fi 6 AI Mesh System * *KA2R15A1 (2022-07-11) • AX1500 Wi-Fi 6 AI Router, AX1500 Smart Router * *KA2R32A1 (2022-05-13) • AX3200 Smart Router * *KA2R12A1 (2022-05-10) • AC1200 Smart Router *KA2M15A1 (2022-02-17) • AX1500 Wi-Fi 6 AI Mesh Router * [[Category:English Documentation]]
